about_the_game:
From the creator of Super Amazing Wagon Adventure comes a platformer with a focus on expressive controls. Meet J.Me a happy robot hero of an unfinished game. Everything is going great for J.Me until one day J.Me's disillusioned developer cancels J.Me's game and deletes the planet. Now J.Me is abandoned in a universe of games. Please help J.Me!

Expressive new jump controls


J.Me has an expressive and intuitive collection of moves including a twirl button and left and right roll buttons for maximum air control. Duck, stretch, dive, spin, and more--or you can just keep pressing jump! Play how you want with a controller or keyboard.

Features

  • 6 diverse pixel art worlds: visit First World, Computer World, Bird World, and more!
  • Bounce off enemies and obstacles inspired by the world of games: checker pieces, pawns, dominos, basketballs, footballs, and much more!
  • Powerups that alter J.Me's controls and appearance: 🚀 Jet Mode, 🏁 Race Mode, and another one I'm keeping secret for now 🤫
detailed_description:
From the creator of Super Amazing Wagon Adventure comes a platformer with a focus on expressive controls. Meet J.Me a happy robot hero of an unfinished game. J.Me has an expressive and intuitive collection of moves including a twirl button and left and right roll buttons for maximum air control. Duck, stretch, dive, spin, and more--or you can just keep pressing jump! Play how you want with a controller or keyboard.

name: Jump Mechanic

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 64 Bit
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 Compatible
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: A cute 2d platformer with an emphasis on intuitive, expressive controls. Jump, twirl, roll, dive, spin, and more across 6 diverse pixel art worlds.
